basics.summary: Director of Marketing Technology with 7 years of experience and extensive expertise in digital transformation and business growth, leveraging innovative marketing strategies and advanced tech solutions. Demonstrates proficiency in leading cross-functional teams and optimizing customer experiences through marketing automation and CRM integrations, achieving significant improvements in conversion rates. Passionate about data-driven insights to future-proof marketing operations and drive measurable results.

work.summary: Lead technical marketing strategy and manage development team, implementing modern tech stack solutions to improve marketing efficiency and customer experience. Spearhead digital transformation initiatives, like migrating websites to a modern tech stack, which in turn dramatically improved site performance and best practices. Optimize marketing automation and CRM integrations using Salesforce Marketing Cloud, SF Marketing Intelligence, SF Data Cloud, Google Analytics. Translate complex technical concepts into actionable marketing strategies for stakeholders.

Translate complex technical concepts into actionable marketing strategies for stakeholders.

work.summary: Spearheaded strategic initiatives, boosting funding efficiency and optimizing service delivery through data-driven strategies and team leadership. Pioneered data analytics framework to evaluate and enhance service delivery, driving significant improvements in operational efficiency and client outcomes. Fostered a high-performing team culture, leading 12 staff members to exceed targets and deliver exceptional results while appropriately managing a government-grant-based budget.

work.summary: Orchestrated end-to-end website development projects, dramatically enhancing organic search traffic and lead generation, driving sustainable growth. Partnered with clients to implement effective SEO strategies, improving online visibility. Created customized web solutions using modern development tools. Meticulously analyzed and optimized website performance, enhancing search rankings. Developed precise, efficient web solutions using contemporary JavaScript frameworks.

work.summary: Consulted on information governance and data integrity to Fortune 100 healthcare institutions, resulting in enhanced safeguarding and gathering of strategic insight from critical data. Identified data discrepancies and organized a team to correct inaccuracies within large-scale data sets, directing the implementation of automated solutions within one client organization to eradicate patient safety-critical data inaccuracy by way of combining approximately 300,000 duplicate patient records. Forged strategic partnerships with internal and external stakeholders, aligning technical optimizations with business objectives and outperforming customer satisfaction benchmarks. Analyzed complex healthcare systems, optimizing workflows and enhancing patient care. Developed innovative solutions, significantly improving operational efficiency.

volunteer.position: Vice President and Marketing Team Lead
volunteer.company: Chinese Language and Culture Club @UW Madison
volunteer.summary: Coordinated a team of up to 15 volunteer marketers, effectively delegating tasks and ensuring efficient workflow to increase the club's online visibility and engagement. Increased email list engagement by 50% through the development and implementation of a weekly newsletter run through MailChimp, reaching over 2,000 recipients. Executed a comprehensive content strategy across multiple platforms, including Instagram, Facebook, and email newsletter.
